segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the sink overflow unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps coming, ruining the kitchen slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s so focused on her plate, missing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the water, she’ll be upset when she realizes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children sneaking cookies, but it’s risky and secretive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that unstable stool, one slip and pain follows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could get hurt, and the girl too if she reaches wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this mischief behind the mom’s back feels lonely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is tidy, but inside it’s falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they could all just enjoy the day safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heart, so much potential for sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might bring a smile, but the hazards loom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a reminder of how fragile happy homes can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, unaware of the mess building up.
segments.speaker: PAR
